attributes.action: change the rules governing ballot papers to rename "spoilt ballot papers" (where there is a cross in every box, or nothing in any box) as an "abstention of vote".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that the terminology applied to voting is misleading in the extreme.  Those voters who take the trouble to go to a polling station to vote would be stupid to waste their time by the deliberate vadalism of the ballot paper.  Instead these voters are trying to make a serious point and it would be more accurate to record the vote as an abstention.  However, I do not expect this petition to get very far as it is in the interests of politicians not to concede such a thing!
